title: Amy Schumer had 'the best time' at Jennifer Lawrence's nuptials
text:
They've been the best of friends for many years.

And Amy Schumer revealed on Sunday that she had 'the best time' at Jennifer Lawrence's wedding to Cooke Maroney in Newport, Rhode Island, on Saturday night.

The 38-year-old comedian joked about her wedding day apparel as she shared a photo of Tilda Swinton in The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe.

Scroll down for video

Always joking: Amy Schumer shared a post of Tilda Swinton in The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe to caption that she had had 'the best time' at BFF Jennifer Lawrence's wedding the night before

'Chris and I had the best time #balmain.'

The photo which has now been deleted was of Tilda Swinton as The White Witch, standing beside her servant dwarf from 2005 hit movie, The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, according to People.

It is not clear why Amy took down the post, but reports have revealed there was a very strict social media blackout at Jennifer's wedding.

Wedding day apparel? The photo which has now been deleted was of Tilda Swinton as The White Witch, standing beside her servant dwarf from 2005 hit movie, The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, according to People (Tilda Swinton in The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe)

While it's been reported that Amy was in attendance of the wedding of the year, no photos of her arriving or leaving have been seen.

Other confirmed attendees included; Kris Jenner, Adele, Emma Stone, Sienna Miller and Ashley Olsen.

Jennifer was in attendance for Amy's surprise wedding back in February 2018.

Speaking of the event to Entertainment Tonight days after the nuptials, she said she was 'sobbing.'

Long term pals: Jennifer was in attendance for Amy's surprise wedding back in February 2018

'It was beautiful. It was very sudden, but it was, I was sobbing the whole time,' she said.

'His vows were stunning. It's when two people really love each other and they really mean it, it shows, and it was a beautiful ceremony and an amazing time. I couldn't be happier for them.'

And as close friends, the pair aren't shy of hilariously calling each other out online.

Amy recently shared a text conversation in which Jennifer joked that she was going to resent her new baby, Gene Attlel, as the new mom was ignoring her.

It all started when the I Feel Pretty star failed to immediately text back the new bride and answer her questions on the Handmaid's Tale.

'Are you asleep bc of the baby??? Are you asleep before 11? Is this bc of the baby? Don't make me resent the baby.'

Preoccupied: Amy recently shared a text conversation in which Jennifer joked that she was going to resent her new baby, Gene Attlel, as the new mom was ignoring her

Needs attention: 'Are you asleep bc of the baby??? Are you asleep before 11? Is this bc of the baby? Don't make me resent the baby'

She continued: 'Wow. Ur really asleep before 11. I'll be damned.'

Amy hilariously captioned: 'Everybody keeping their cool about me having a baby.'

The comedian also revealed on the Ellen DeGeneres Show in April 2018 that the Hunger Games Actress had invited her out to dinner before retracting her invite.

'What're you doing for dinner? You and chris wanna get dinner? or hang?' she asked.

In the next message she said: 'Also I'm about to go to park.'

She ended with: 'Haha I can't have dinner tonight I have plans.'

Amy responded two hours later with: 'Good talk.'
